articles.description: Kate Middleton said, “It's very special having a new little girl. I feel very, very lucky that George has got a little sister." | World News
articles.content: Prince William and Kate Middleton welcomes their second child Charlotte Elizabeth Diana at St. Mary's Hospital in London on May 2, 2015. Princess Charlotte is the fourth in the line of succession to … [+376 chars]
